familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president of OPO Hotel Manager LLC, in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, is not inactive nor dormant, and is not part of an entity structure or license deal.

Former director/chairman/president of OPO Hotel Manager Member Corp., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
